subject: Re: [junit] nightly build feature
msgSnippet: ... If I had to start a Java project with /just one book/, I d choose this one: http://tinyurl.com/jp643 And no, I didn t write it. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
didoss@... wrote:
>
>
> Write tests and code,...write an Ant script to run all the
> tests,...schedule the ant script to run nightly.

If I had to start a Java project with /just one book/, I'd choose this
one: http://tinyurl.com/jp643

And no, I didn't write it.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
